name: modular-forms
description: The modular and type-safe form library for SolidJS and Qwik
author: Fabian Hiller

scripts.stackblitz.playground.qwik: pnpm install && cd packages/qwik && pnpm build && cd ../../playgrounds/qwik && pnpm dev
scripts.stackblitz.playground.solid: pnpm install && cd packages/solid && pnpm build && cd ../../playgrounds/solid && pnpm dev
